function.name: FilterZero
function.description: Filters out telemetry streams with zero values or no value in a telemetry stream collection.
function.parameters: (1) The telemetry stream collection to be filtered.

function.name: Filter
function.description: Filters telemetry streams in a telemetry stream collection.
function.parameters: (1) The telemetry stream collection to be filtered. (2) One of 'Avg|Max|Min|Last|Delta|SimpleDelta'. (3) One of 'Above|Below|Top|Bottom|TopPercent|BottomPercent'. (4) A cutoff or threshold value.
